card.name: Bandage
card.property: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Takara shook with guilt. She knew the last image her father had seen was her sword flashing toward him.

card.name: Calming Licid
card.property: {W}, {T}: Calming Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {W} to end this effect. Enchanted creature can't attack.

card.name: Change of Heart
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Target creature can't attack this turn.

card.name: Contemplation
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How fascinating it is to watch the machinations of one's own mind play themselves out." —Volrath

card.name: Conviction
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+3. {W}: Return Conviction to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was not the minotaur's shoulders but his soul that bore the heaviest weight.

card.name: Hidden Retreat
card.property: Put a card from your hand on top of your library: Prevent all damage that would be dealt by target instant or sorcery spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After an hour in the hidey-hole, Squee seriously pondered the advantages of danger over boredom.

card.name: Honor Guard
card.property: {W}: Honor Guard gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is not a choice I make, to have this guard. It is the choice of my people, and my duty to them." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Lancers en-Kor
card.property: Trample {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Lancers en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nearly all sets of Kor twins are trained as lancers.

card.name: Nomads en-Kor
card.property: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Nomads en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Kor forsake roots for the winding of the path; forsake voices for the silence of the mind; forsake all else for the poverty of isolation.

card.name: Pursuit of Knowledge
card.property: If you would draw a card, you may put a study counter on Pursuit of Knowledge instead. Remove three study counters from Pursuit of Knowledge, Sacrifice Pursuit of Knowledge: Draw seven cards.

card.name: Rolling Stones
card.property: Wall creatures can attack as though they didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Walls collapse and kill people all the time. Some are just more aggressive about it.

card.name: Sacred Ground
card.property: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes a land to be put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That which knows itself cannot be shaped to another's will." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Samite Blessing
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, prevent that damage."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Knit bone, darn flesh, Stitch skin, weave breath. —Samite healing ritual

card.name: Scapegoat
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Return any number of target creatures you control to their owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Enjoy your deception, Vuel," Gerrard said as Volrath's features melted from the dead shapeshifter. "I'll count this one as practice."

card.name: Shaman en-Kor
card.property: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Shaman en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead. {1}{W}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, that damage is dealt to Shaman en-Kor instead.

card.name: Skyshroud Falcon
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The falcon slits the sky to let the light drip through. —Kor saying

card.name: Smite
card.property: Destroy target blocked creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You've got your childhood wish at last. Now you get to die." —Gerrard, to Volrath

card.name: Soltari Champion
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Whenever Soltari Champion attacks, other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Spirit en-Kor
card.property: Flying {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Spirit en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death free throat from thirst, mouth from speech, feet from earth. —Kor requiem

card.name: Temper
card.property: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't need a plan, just a goal. The rest will follow on its own." —Gerrard

card.name: Venerable Monk
card.property: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Age wears the flesh but galvanizes the soul.

card.name: Wall of Essence
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Wall of Essence is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ceiling and the floor fell in love, but only the wall knew. —Dal saying

card.name: Warrior en-Kor
card.property: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Warrior en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only a matter as vital as destroying Volrath could bring together the reclusive Kor people.

card.name: Warrior Angel
card.property: Flying Whenever Warrior Angel deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She represents not hope, but hope's desperate fury.

card.name: Youthful Knight
card.property: First strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let no child be without a sword. We will all fight, for if we fail, we will certainly all die." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Cloud Spirit
card.property: Flying Cloud Spirit can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Clouds are the soil, dreams are the crop. —Kor saying

card.name: Contempt
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature attacks, return it and Contempt to their owners' hands at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Predictable little man. In all these years you taught me so much yet learned so little." —Volrath, to Starke

card.name: Dream Halls
card.property: Rather than pay the mana cost for a spell, its controller may discard a card that shares a color with that spell.

card.name: Dream Prowler
card.property: Dream Prowler can't be blocked as long as it's attacking alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To think that some find sleep a restful state." —Volrath

card.name: Evacuation
card.property: Return all creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first step of every exodus is from the blood and the fire onto the trail.

card.name: Gliding Licid
card.property: {U}, {T}: Gliding Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {U} to end this effect. Enchanted creature has flying.

card.name: Hammerhead Shark
card.property: Hammerhead Shark can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cross the eyes of a hammerhead and you'll dot its teeth.

card.name: Hesitation
card.property: When a player casts a spell, sacrifice Hesitation and counter that spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gerrard hesitated, looking up at the enemy ship. The future hesitated with him, changed forever by the pause.

card.name: Intruder Alarm
card.property: Creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, untap all creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirri was startled by Volrath's apparition—it had no scent.

card.name: Leap
card.property: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirri leapt quickly and silently. The guard died likewise.

card.name: Mana Leak
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy." —Volrath

card.name: Mask of the Mimic
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for a card with the same name as target nontoken creature and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Mind Games
card.property: Buyback {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

card.name: Ransack
card.property: Look at the top five cards of target player's library. Put any number of them on the bottom of that library in any order and the rest on top of the library in any order.

card.name: Rebound
card.property: Change the target of target spell that targets only a player. The new target must be a player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Insult, like an arrow, is beyond control once loosed.

card.name: Reins of Power
card.property: Untap all creatures you control and all creatures target opponent controls. You and that opponent each gain control of all creatures the other controls until end of turn. Those creatures gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Sift
card.property: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Twice I have let the Legacy slip away. Never again."—Karn, silver golem

card.name: Silver Wyvern
card.property: Flying {U}: Change the target of target spell or ability that targets only Silver Wyvern. The new target must be a creature.

card.name: Spindrift Drake
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Spindrift Drake unless you pay {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sea brine for blood, washing foam for laughter.

card.name: Thalakos Deceiver
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Whenever Thalakos Deceiver attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, gain control of target creature. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Tidal Surge
card.property: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is nature that gives us our boundaries and nature that enforces them." —Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Tidal Warrior
card.property: {T}: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The tide of battle favors those who can swim.

card.name: Volrath's Shapeshifter
card.property: As long as the top card of your graveyard is a creature card, Volrath's Shapeshifter has the full text of that card and has the text "{2}: Discard a card." (Volrath's Shapeshifter has that card's name, mana cost, color, types, abilities, power, and toughness.) {2}: Discard a card.

card.name: Walking Dream
card.property: Walking Dream can't be blocked. Walking Dream doesn't untap during your untap step if an opponent controls two or more creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dreams, by definition, live shorter lives than those who dream them.

card.name: Wall of Tears
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Wall of Tears blocks a creature, return that creature to its owner's hand at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Many have been lost to pity."—Karn, silver golem

card.name: Bottomless Pit
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player discards a card at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm sure it came with the place. I don't think you build one on purpose." —Gerrard

card.name: Brush with Death
card.property: Buyback {2}{B}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B}{B} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Target opponent loses 2 life. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Cannibalize
card.property: Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. Exile one of those creatures and put two +1/+1 counters on the other.

card.name: Corrupting Licid
card.property: {B}, {T}: Corrupting Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {B} to end this effect. Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

card.name: Crovax the Cursed
card.property: Crovax the Cursed enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Crovax. If you don't, remove a +1/+1 counter from Crovax. {B}: Crovax gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Dauthi Trapper
card.property: {T}: Target creature gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Merfolk tell their young of Dandân, humans of Rag Man. Dal tell tales of the Dauthi, and they are far worse.

card.name: Death Stroke
card.property: Destroy target tapped creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For a sharp second, Selenia froze, and Crovax's blade found home. As the angel shattered like glass, Crovax felt his mind collapse—the curse had been fulfilled.

card.name: Dungeon Shade
card.property: Flying {B}: Dungeon Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A sickness stirs in its eyes, a nightmare born in darkened wails.

card.name: Foul Imp
card.property: Flying When Foul Imp enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The imp, unaware of its own odor, paused to catch its breath . . . and promptly died.

card.name: Grave Pact
card.property: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bonds of loyalty can tie one to the grave." —Crovax

card.name: Lab Rats
card.property: Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.

card.name: Megrim
card.property: Whenever an opponent discards a card, Megrim deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can run from your pain," explained Gerrard to Crovax, "but take it from experience: you will tire before it does."

card.name: Mind Peel
card.property: Buyback {2}{B}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B}{B} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Target player discards a card.

card.name: Mindwarper
card.property: Mindwarper enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. {2}{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Mindwarper: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Morgue Thrull
card.property: Sacrifice Morgue Thrull: Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's so hard to find good help these days.

card.name: Mortuary
card.property: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put that card on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Think of them not as failures but as works in progress." —Volrath

card.name: Rabid Rats
card.property: {T}: Target blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every sentence in Volrath's prisons ends the same way.

card.name: Revenant
card.property: Flying Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Serpent Warrior
card.property: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

card.name: Skeleton Scavengers
card.property: Skeleton Scavengers enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. Pay {1} for each +1/+1 counter on Skeleton Scavengers: Regenerate Skeleton Scavengers. When it regenerates this way, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Stronghold Assassin
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The assassin sees only throats and hears only heartbeats.

card.name: Stronghold Taskmaster
card.property: Other black creatures get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With the completion of each joyous task, we are closer to Yawgmoth's divine vision." —Stronghold architect, journal

card.name: Torment
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Volrath has killed me. All that remains of me is the scar!" —Tahngarth

card.name: Tortured Existence
card.property: {B}, Discard a creature card: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are terrors lurking in the unseen corners of us all." —Crovax

card.name: Wall of Souls
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Wall of Souls is dealt combat damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is the nature of evil to turn you against yourself." —Starke

card.name: Amok
card.property: {1}, Discard a card at random: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Crovax's rage was horrifying. Within moments only blood and shreds of flesh remained of the shapeshifter.

card.name: Convulsing Licid
card.property: {R}, {T}: Convulsing Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {R} to end this effect. Enchanted creature can't block.

card.name: Craven Giant
card.property: Craven Giant can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What is high as a mountain and low as a snake? —Dal riddle

card.name: Duct Crawler
card.property: {1} {R}: Target creature can't block Duct Crawler this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The mountain's ducts will be like organ pipes, amplifying the glorious roar of the dying." —Stronghold architect, journal

card.name: Fanning the Flames
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Fanning the Flames deals X damage to any target.

card.name: Flame Wave
card.property: Flame Wave deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I hear the roaring of a wave whose waters are red and whose mists are black." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Fling
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

card.name: Flowstone Blade
card.property: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember the fable of the elf who came upon a cave of gold. In trying to free the largest piece, she was crushed by its weight." —Karn, silver golem

card.name: Flowstone Hellion
card.property: Haste {0}: Flowstone Hellion gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Flowstone Mauler
card.property: Trample {R}: Flowstone Mauler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once these horrifying creatures were perfected, there was no need for armodons.

card.name: Flowstone Shambler
card.property: {R}: Flowstone Shambler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Flowstone troops are notoriously difficult to keep in formation.

card.name: Furnace Spirit
card.property: Haste {R}: Furnace Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If it can survive the Furnace, you don't want it near you.

card.name: Heat of Battle
card.property: Whenever a creature blocks, Heat of Battle deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Takara, it's me!" shouted Starke. It was no use—she obeyed Volrath.

card.name: Invasion Plans
card.property: All creatures block each combat if able. The attacking player chooses how each creature blocks each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gerrard studied the globe as Mirri kept watch. Suddenly, his eyes widened. "This is Dominaria!"

card.name: Mob Justice
card.property: Mob Justice deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single stone can start an avalanche.

card.name: Mogg Bombers
card.property: When another creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice Mogg Bombers and it deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Behind every great mogg bomber is another mogg with a shovel and a basket.

card.name: Mogg Flunkies
card.property: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They'll attack whatever's in front of them—as long as you tell them where that is.

card.name: Mogg Infestation
card.property: Destroy all creatures target player controls. For each creature that died this way, that player creates two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

card.name: Mogg Maniac
card.property: Whenever Mogg Maniac is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stand clear if he gets an itch.

card.name: Ruination
card.property: Destroy all nonbasic lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have built a wall upon sand. The wall will vanish. The sand will remain." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Seething Anger
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Shard Phoenix
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Sacrifice Shard Phoenix: It deals 2 damage to each creature without flying. {R}{R}{R}: Return Shard Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Shock
card.property: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lightning tethers souls to the world. —Kor saying

card.name: Spitting Hydra
card.property: Spitting Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spitting Hydra: It deals 1 damage to target creature.

card.name: Wall of Razors
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) First strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In this blessed structure let the very walls baptize themselves in the blood of intruders." —Stronghold architect, journal

card.name: Awakening
card.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, untap all creatures and lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are times when destiny calls forth a people and demands an action. Now is the time. We are the people. This is our action. Charge!" —Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Burgeoning
card.property: Whenever an opponent plays a land, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The plants said, 'We will fight the stone with root and stem and seed. We are patient. We will win.'" —Skyshroud myth of the forest

card.name: Carnassid
card.property: Trample {1}{G}: Regenerate Carnassid.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hunter would never forget the time or place where he first met the carnassid, for they buried him there.

card.name: Constant Mists
card.property: Buyback—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Crossbow Ambush
card.property: Creatures you control gain reach until end of turn. (They can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no drake that flies faster than a crossbow bolt. —Vec saying

card.name: Elven Rite
card.property: Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the bough stretches, so shall you grow. As the roots spread, so shall you thrive.

card.name: Endangered Armodon
card.property: When you control a creature with toughness 2 or less, sacrifice Endangered Armodon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These are its last days. Its doom to be remembered only until the hunters hunger again.

card.name: Hermit Druid
card.property: {G}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a basic land card. Put that card into your hand and all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Seeking the company of plants ensures that your wits will go to seed.

card.name: Lowland Basilisk
card.property: Whenever Lowland Basilisk deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unlike their cousins, Rathi basilisks turn their victims into puddles of flowstone.

card.name: Mulch
card.property: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hope is the one crop that can grow in any climate.

card.name: Overgrowth
card.property: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}{G}.

card.name: Primal Rage
card.property: Creatures you control have trample. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Charge!" A great cry went out, and countless elves and Vec soldiers charged up the mountain. Their fury and passion hid the fact that they were horribly outnumbered.

card.name: Provoke
card.property: Untap target creature you don't control. That creature blocks this turn if able. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirri did not have time to think, only to react.

card.name: Skyshroud Archer
card.property: {T}: Target creature with flying gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Rath, arrows are guided not by virtue but by necessity.

card.name: Skyshroud Troopers
card.property: {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We were not made for war. Like flowstone, Volrath shaped us to it." —Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Spike Breeder
card.property: Spike Breeder enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Breeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Breeder: Create a 1/1 green Spike creature token.

card.name: Spike Colony
card.property: Spike Colony enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Colony: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Spike Feeder
card.property: Spike Feeder enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: You gain 2 life.

card.name: Spike Soldier
card.property: Spike Soldier enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Soldier: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Soldier: Spike Soldier gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Spike Worker
card.property: Spike Worker enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Worker: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As it moved, the wurm's spines gathered up bits of flowstone, which took the shapes of dead villagers' heads. Each head spoke a single sound, but if taken together, they said, 'Alas for the living.'" —Dal myth of the wurm

card.name: Tempting Licid
card.property: {G}, {T}: Tempting Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {G} to end this effect. All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

card.name: Verdant Touch
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Target land becomes a 2/2 creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Volrath's Gardens
card.property: {2}, Tap an untapped creature you control: You gain 2 life. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Watch yourself," warned Starke. "These plants aren't nice when they're hungry."

card.name: Wall of Blossoms
card.property: Defender When Wall of Blossoms enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each flower identical, every leaf and petal disturbingly exact.

card.name: Acidic Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: This permanent deals 2 damage to any target."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first sliver burst against the cave wall, and others piled in behind to deepen the new tunnel.

card.name: Crystalline Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bred as living shields, these slivers have proven unruly—they know they cannot be caught.

card.name: Hibernation Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have "Pay 2 life: Return this permanent to its owner's hand."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mogglings have been known to play ball with hibernating slivers, completely unaware of their true nature.

card.name: Sliver Queen

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: {2}: Create a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her children are ever part of her.

card.name: Spined Sliver
card.property: Whenever a Sliver becomes blocked, that Sliver gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Slivers are evil and slivers are sly; And if you get eaten, then no one will cry." —Mogg children's rhyme

card.name: Victual Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: You gain 4 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are kinfolk," explained Karn to the sliver queen. "Just as you need your progeny to complete you, so do I need the pieces of the Legacy to make me whole."

card.name: Bullwhip
card.property: {2}, {T}: Bullwhip deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature attacks this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pain is a crude way to enforce obedience, but it is cheap and plentiful." —Volrath

card.name: Ensnaring Bridge
card.property: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I expected a fight, but I didn't expect it from the building itself." —Gerrard

card.name: Heartstone
card.property: Activated abilities of creatures cost {1} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Finding a true heartstone is even harder than finding a true heart." —Hanna

card.name: Horn of Greed
card.property: Whenever a player plays a land, that player draws a card.

card.name: Hornet Cannon
card.property: {3}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying and haste named Hornet. Destroy it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Jinxed Ring
card.property: Whenever a nontoken permanent is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, Jinxed Ring deals 1 damage to you. Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent gains control of Jinxed Ring. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Mox Diamond
card.property: If Mox Diamond would enter the battlefield, you may discard a land card instead. If you do, put Mox Diamond onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Portcullis
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, if there are two or more other creatures on the battlefield, exile that creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control when Portcullis leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Shifting Wall
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Shifting Wall enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You'd almost think Volrath doesn't want me here."—Gerrard

card.name: Sword of the Chosen
card.property: {T}: Target legendary creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One shard of Selenia yet remained.

card.name: Volrath's Laboratory
card.property: As Volrath's Laboratory enters the battlefield, choose a color and a creature type. {5}, {T}: Create a 2/2 creature token of the chosen color and type.

card.name: Volrath's Stronghold
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The seed of a world's evil.
